message: Let's make a deal! Take this generous offer while it lasts, Bob. The clock is ticking!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly. Don't let time diminish the value!
Bob, this is a fair deal considering the time pressure. I'm willing to be reasonable, but I need you to meet me halfway.
Alice, this is my final offer.  It's crucial we settle this now before inflation eats away at your share even more. Let's be practical and end this.
